name: Intergalactic Smuggler - GATE Games
description:
Tl;dr:

  • Arrows/WASD to control your ship
  • Space for main weapon
  • Left Shift for secondary weapons
  • Collect power-ups and travel through different dimensions!
  • (M to mute)

You are an intergalactic smuggler, on a dangerous mission for the Resistance! Your ship is loaded with much needed supplies that will help end the horrible Oppression! You must reach the Resistance Base to deliver the goods. The evil Oppression has scattered enemy drones all around space. Destroy them before they destroy you!

Portals lead to different dimensions where space completely different but will also provide you with different power-ups!

Good luck, have fun!
